data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Ambedkar Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,371,523 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ambedkar Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Ambedkar Nagar, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Ambedkar Nagar.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Ambedkar Nagar to agree with you and with one another.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Gadaria Dhingar people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Gadaria Dhingar people.
Please, convict the 26,377 believers in Ambedkar Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Ambedkar Nagar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 26,377 believers in Ambedkar Nagar against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

location.name: Ambedkar Nagar
location.people_groups_list: Gadaria Nikhad, Lakhera, Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions), Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions), Rajput (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gadaria Nikhad (1,373,000), Lakhera (189,000), Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions) (273,000), Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions) (1,800), Rajput (Muslim traditions) (2,893,000)
